news.title: Ken Sweeney announces reissue of Brian's debut album Understand
news.summary: The reissue of Understood will feature four songs from the previously released Planes EP and unreleased track 'If You Knew'

news.title: Joni Mitchell tribute band Hejira announce upcoming Ireland and UK tour
news.summary: The Celebration of Joni Mitchell will include gigs in Limerick, Galway, Tullamore, Belfast and Ballybofey in early September.

news.title: Electric Picnic 2025 sneak peak: new attractions and old favourites for the festival's biggest crowd yet
news.summary: A snazzy piano stage, The Cranberries reunion, an old-fashioned train and more: all that's new and hot at Electric Picnic 2025.

news.title: Kingfishr on course for Top 5 debut on UK Albums Chart with Halcyon
news.summary: The folk three-piece are set to play the main stage at Electric Picnic this weekend

news.title: Lala Poutine at Electric Picnic: Hand-cut chips in rich gravy, topped off with delicious cheese curds
